data.name: Everyday Business Account
data.description: An Everyday Business Account gives you simple, fast and efficient access to your money. With a number of great features and benefits including up to 10 free assisted transactions and up to 20 free electronic transactions per month, a MyState Everyday Business Account is a convenient way to manage your business banking needs from day to day

features.additionalInfo: Stay flexible anywhere and anytime with the MyState Bank app.
Send and receive money in less than 60 seconds.

Staff Assisted transactionsA transaction completed with staff by visiting our branch, through our Customer Care team, mail, or fax. These are:1. cash withdrawals;2. transfers from one of your accounts to another;3. transfers to another MyState Bank customer;4. exchanging a cheque for cash; and5. a cash advance from your account transacted at another financial institution.
Send and receive money in less than 60 seconds. Add your mobile number or email address as a PayID and use this in place of your BSB and Account number.

fees.name: BPay Query Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when you request a trace of a BPAY transaction.

fees.name: Card Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Within Australia. Applicable for the replacement of a MyState Bank Visa Debit Card except if:1. The card is faulty at time of issue and returned to us; or2. The card is stolen and a copy of a police report is provided.

fees.name: Cheques Deposited and Dishonoured
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when a cheque, not your own, has been deposited in to your account and has been dishonoured by the other financial institution.

fees.name: Dishonour and Rejection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee will be debited to your account on the day of the dishonour or rejection. This fee is charged when any payment on your account is unable to be completed.

fees.name: External Internet Banking Transfer Rejection Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when any Internet Banking payment from your account to another financial institution is rejected and returned to us.This fee will be debited to your account on the day of receipt of notification of the rejection.

fees.name: Overdrawn Account Interest
fees.additionalInfo: Deposit accounts without overdraft arrangements must have a credit balance. We are under no obligation to honour cheques, or allow any withdrawal that would overdraw an account without an approved overdraft facility.If we honour a cheque or debit which overdraws an account, the amount overdrawn (referred to as the credit provided will attract debit interest charged to the account on the last day of the calendar month. This interest which will be charged to your account as 'Overdraft Interest' is calculated on the daily closing debit balance using the current 'Unarranged Borrowing Rate'. Please refer to our Interest Rates for Household and Personal Lending brochure available from any branch or by contacting the Customer Care for the current 'Unarranged Borrowing Rate'. Any credit provided is short term credit and must be repaid within 7 days of being provided. In addition, Overdrawn Administration Fees will be applied.

fees.name: Overdrawn Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Overdrawn FeePer daily occurrence, for any savings or transaction account (with or without an pproved overdraft limit) where we honour a transaction that overdraws the account or exceeds the authorised overdraft limit.

fees.name: Representation and Collection of Dishonoured Cheques
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged when a cheque previously deposited to your account is re-presented for payment.

fees.name: Staff Assisted
fees.additionalInfo: Staff Assisted transactions are not allowed on this account. If we agree to complete a withdrawal or transfer on your behalf, then the applicable Staff Assisted Excess Transaction Fee will apply.

fees.name: Statement Replacement
fees.additionalInfo: Replacement copy of original statementPer page $5.00

fees.name: Stop Payment
fees.additionalInfo: A request that payment not be made on cheque written by you, but not yet presented. This fee will be charged if the cheque is presented. This fee also applies to direct debits, periodical payments, transfer orders and BPAY future payments if we receive a request to stop payment on a drawing.

fees.name: Transaction Verification Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when we are requested to investigate a transaction. The fee will not be charged if we find that the transaction is incorrect.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Conversion
fees.additionalInfo: Visa International will convert all transactions made overseas on the Visa Debit Card into Australian dollars at the foreign exchange rate that applies on the day the transaction is processed by Visa International.A conversion fee of 3% of the value of the transaction is payable (of which 2% is payable to Cuscal Limited, the principal member of Visa International under which we provide Visa Debit Cards).

fees.name: Excess Electronic Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 30 included transactions, then excess transaction fee (per transaction) applies.

fees.name: Excess Staff Assisted Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 10 included transactions, then excess transaction fee (per transaction) applies.

fees.name: Bank@Post withdrawal fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is debited on the last day of each month and is charged in addition to any electronic transaction fee which may apply.

fees.name: Cheques written
fees.additionalInfo: For each cheque that you write nd is presented for payment.
